title: News24.com | ‘He went to buy bread and never came back home’: Chaos erupts as family mourns child’s death
description: The body of a young boy who had just been hit by a police vehicle still lay on the street when two police vehicles and an ambulance were torched in Lichtenburg, North West.
content:
The body of a young boy who had just been hit by a police vehicle still lay on the street when two police vehicles and an ambulance were torched in Lichtenburg, North West.
The incident dragged community members out of their Covid-19 coronavirus lockdown. Th… [+3200 chars]
